ques: In the mid-section formula
optionA: The mean depth is the average of depths of two consecutive sections
optionB: The area of mid-sections is calculated by using mean depth
optionC: The volume of the earth work is calculated by multiplying the mid-section area by the distance between the two original sections

ques: Pick up the correct statement from the following:
optionA: The earth work of cutting in trenches or borrow pits in fairly uniform ground is measured with the help of average depths of the dead men
optionB: The earth work in trenches or borrow pits in irregular ground is measured by taking the difference in levels before and after completion of work
optionC: The earth work in trenches or borrow pits, where neither a nor b is feasible, are measured from the fillings after deduction of voids
